evidence.text: Person A: Sorry. It's an original Hatori, and it's very special. And very sharp. Just don't want you to hurt yourself, brother.

Person A: Alright kids. Sail's up. Who's ready to catch some beautiful grouper?
Person B: Yeah baby! Can I bring the muffins?
Person A: Bring the muffins!

Person B: When I was like, four, my sister, she shoved me, like, by accident, she's not like a sociopath, and my teeth, my baby teeth, went right back up into their teeth holes. They grew back. How's your nose?
Person A: Stop moving. Babe, just stop moving.
Person B: They just went crazy! What the fuck?! We were just hanging out!!

Person A: But we're such nice guys!
Person B: Bro, I'm so sorry, bro. You didn't know. It's not your fault.

Person A: You still don't know.
Person B: What does he mean????
Person A: What is it?
Person B: So why don't you go?!
